guidelines.title: Secure Coding Practices
guidelines.description: This guideline provides recommendations for secure coding practices.

guidelines.title: Network Security
guidelines.description: This guideline provides recommendations for securing networks.

controls.name: Use intrusion detection and prevention systems

guidelines.title: Compliance
guidelines.description: This guideline provides recommendations for ensuring compliance with relevant regulations and standards.

Secure Coding Practices.Use strong passwords: Use passwords that are at least 12 characters long and include a mix of uppercase and lowercase letters, numbers, and symbols.
Secure Coding Practices.Validate user input: Validate user input to prevent malicious code from being executed.

Network Security.Use a firewall: Use a firewall to block unauthorized access to your network.
Network Security.Use intrusion detection and prevention s: Use intrusion detection and prevention systems to detect and block malicious activity on your network.

Compliance.Conduct regular audits: Conduct regular audits to ensure compliance with relevant regulations and standards.
Compliance.Maintain accurate records: Maintain accurate and up-to-date records of all security-related activities.
